captions.text: ANC PRESENTS A BRAND NEW VERSION OF BREAKING BAD!
>>IT'S EXACTLY LIKE THE ORIGINAL WITH A FAMILY FRIENDLY TWIST.
>>YOU WANT TO TEACH CRYSTAL CLEAR MATH?
I KNOW HOW TO INSTRUCT AND YOU KNOW THE STUDENTS
SO WE GOING TO LIKE MAKE MATH.
WE'RE GOING TO NEED A SAFE PLACE TO TEACH.
A SHOT FOR SHOT REMAKE OF THE ORIGINAL HIT
SERIES BREAKING BAD, BUT THIS TIME IT'S FUN
>>THESE GEOMETRIC PROOFS ARE LIKE TWO PAGES LONG.
>>NOW I NEED YOU TO DISTRIBUTE THESE TO EVERY
THOSE KIDS CRAVE MATH MORE THAN ANYONE.
>>YOU WRITE ALL OF YOUR MATH IN BLUE INK?
WHAT IF YOU MAKE LIKE A MISTAKE?
LIKE I CAN TAKE ON ANY COMPLEX FRACTIONS!
THIS GUYS SEEMS TO BE TAKING OVER.
EVEN THE PREP SCHOOLS ARE GETTING NERVOUS.
>>WE GOT TO FIND HIM BEFORE ANOTHER NERD GETS KILLED,
>>SO WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO ABOUT THAT GUY?
PARTIAL DERIVATIVES, BUT WHAT IS X?
I FORGOT SOMETHING IN THE CAR.
>>EXPERIENCE ALL THE DRAMA FROM THE ORIGINAL WITHOUT ANY OF
>>IT'S ONLY TEMPORARY UNTIL I CAN GET MY TEACHER'S CERTIFCATE.
>>PEOPLE WHO USE MATH AFTER COLLEGE DESERVE TO GO TO PRISON.
>>AND HOW MUCH MATH ARE YOU EXPECTING EXACTLY?
THAT'S LIKE A 100 EQUATIONS PER DAY,
>>I'M NOT SURE HE SHOULD BE TEACHING.
NOW, HOW MUCH WILL WE BE PAID GUS?
THAT'S LIKE A 1,000 DOLLARS PER WEEK MR.WADE.
THIS SHOW PUTS THE ACTION BACK IN FRACTION!
>>WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO MR. WADE?

GUS IS GOING TO KILL US WHEN HE FINDS OUT
ABOUT ALL
THE PRE-CALCULUS WE'VE BEEN DOING ON THE SIDE.
>>I TOLD YOU I'D TAKE CARE OF IT.
>>TUNE IN THIS FALL TO THE SHOW THE NEW YORK TIMES CALLS

AND DON'T FORGET TO TUNE IN NEXT SPRING AS
ANC TURNS THE WALKING
ALL A PART OF THE NEW ANC FAMILY.

title: AMC's Breaking Bad Parody: For Kids! - Studio C
